gettingStarted.name: Getting Started Guide
gettingStarted.description: Help new users quickly understand the core features of the salary management system

welcome.title: Welcome to Salary Management System
welcome.description: We'll help you get started quickly through a few simple steps to understand the main features and operations of the system.
welcome.content: üí° Tip: You can exit the guide at any time by pressing ESC or clicking the close button in the top right corner.

dashboardOverview.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboardOverview.description: This shows key system metrics and recent activities, serving as your daily work starting page.
dashboardOverview.content: On the dashboard, you can see total employees, monthly salary overview, pending tasks, and other important information.

navigationMenu.title: Navigation Menu
navigationMenu.description: Access all functional modules through the left menu, including employee management, payroll management, organizational structure, etc.
navigationMenu.content: Click menu items to expand submenus, double-click to quickly jump to frequently used pages.

employeeManagement.title: Employee Management
employeeManagement.description: Here you can add, edit, and manage employee information - one of the core functions of the system.
employeeManagement.content: Supports batch import of employee information or individual additions. Employee info includes basic details, position info, salary configuration, etc.

payrollManagement.title: Payroll Management
payrollManagement.description: The payroll management module handles employee salary calculation, distribution, and inquiries.
payrollManagement.content: Supports various salary structures, allowing different salary components like base salary, performance bonuses, allowances and deductions.

settingsAndProfile.title: Settings and Profile
settingsAndProfile.description: Configure system parameters in settings, and modify your account information in profile.
settingsAndProfile.content: We recommend completing your profile information first and checking system settings match your usage preferences.

employeeWorkflow.name: Employee Management Workflow
employeeWorkflow.description: Learn the complete process of adding new employees and managing employee information

addEmployee.title: Add New Employee
addEmployee.description: Click the 'Add Employee' button to start adding employee information.
addEmployee.content: Fill in the employee's basic information including name, ID number, contact details, etc.

employeeDetails.title: Complete Employee Details
employeeDetails.description: Add detailed employee information including department, position, hire date, etc.
employeeDetails.content: This information will be used for salary calculation and organizational management.

salaryConfig.title: Configure Salary Information
salaryConfig.description: Set up salary structure and standards for the employee.
salaryConfig.content: You can select existing salary templates or customize salary structure for individual employees.

payrollWorkflow.name: Payroll Processing Workflow
payrollWorkflow.description: Learn the complete process of salary calculation, review, and distribution

payrollCalculation.title: Payroll Calculation
payrollCalculation.description: Select the pay period and the system will automatically calculate employee salaries.
payrollCalculation.content: The calculation considers multiple factors including attendance, performance, allowances and deductions.

payrollReview.title: Payroll Review
payrollReview.description: Review calculation results and confirm data accuracy.
payrollReview.content: You can adjust individual employee salaries and add explanatory notes.

payrollApproval.title: Payroll Approval
payrollApproval.description: Submit payroll data for the approval process.
payrollApproval.content: According to company regulations, payroll may require multi-level approval before distribution.

reporting.name: Reports and Statistics
reporting.description: Learn how to use the system's reporting features for data analysis

reportGeneration.title: Generate Reports
reportGeneration.description: Select report type and time range to generate required data reports.
reportGeneration.content: The system provides various preset report templates and supports custom report formats.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Use charts and statistics to analyze salary data trends.
dataAnalysis.content: You can perform comparative analysis by department, position, time and other dimensions.

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Export report data to formats like Excel, PDF, etc.
exportData.content: Exported data can be used for management reporting or external auditing.
